overview: A ten-year old girl's birthday party in Nevers and its relation to the Te Palace's Bacchanalia in Mantova. Real and animated characters (adapted from Giulio Romano's frescoes) are athered through collage means and share a banquet. This film-performance was produced for the tenth anniversary of the De Nevers Ã  lAube film festival.
title: Bacchanales Neversoises-Mantouanes
